colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GZUNG CHEN PO 'DI BKA' STZAL BA DANG, LHA THAMS CAD DANG, DGE SLONG THAMS CAD DANG, LHA DANG KLU DANG LHA MA YIN DANG, MI DANG, GNOD SBYIN THAMS CAD DANG, NAM MKHA' LDING DANG, DRI ZAR BCAS PA'I 'JIGS RTEN YI RANG TES, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,'PHAGS PA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I GTZUG TOR NAS BYUNG BA'I GDUGS NAG MO CAN ZHES BYA BA'I GZUNGS RDZOGS SO, ,ZHUS DAG , ,,SHRU BHA MASTU  SARBA DZA GA TAm, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
